Class Quaternion

  • public class Quaternion
extends java.lang.Object
    Define a quaternion.
    Author:
    Yannick Some methods has been ported from the open source project SharpDX. Check this project here : https://github.com/sharpdx/SharpDX

      • createFromYawPitchRoll

        public static Quaternion createFromYawPitchRoll(float yaw,
                                float pitch,
                                float roll)
        Create a quaternion with three rotations
        Parameters:
        yaw - Value of yaw rotation (Y)
        pitch - Value of pitch rotation (X)
        roll - Value of roll rotation (Z)
        Returns:
        Return a quaternion with three rotations.
